name: La Gran Aventura Submarina
overview: Abby, the young seahorse, is looking for Silas, the bad uncle of the sea. Silas stole the Tear of Vera, the mirror of hope of the Sea of the Country of Dreams. After stealing Vera's Tear, the Sea of the Land of Dreams has lost its warmth and joy. You have to help the brave Abby to fight at sea. Beware of enemy attacks and discover the amazing treasures. Some treasures make Abby invincible. Abby's tail is also a strong weapon. Abby is prepared to bring joy back to the Sea of Dreams Country. And you?
